name: Little Favors
description:
A little Bitsy game about a cat on a quest for milk.

Tools used: Bitsy, BeepBox, Seleb's Bitsy hacks

This game is free to play, but tips are appreciated! A tip of at least $1.00 will get you an .mp3 download of the background music* as a small thank you.

*Usage note: If you want, you may use the song in your own non-commercial games with credit.
